access_with: Sign in with your TV/Internet provider

access_description_end: If you have a Curiosity Stream account already, please sign in above.
agreement2: -To the Terms Of Use and to acknowledge that I have read and understood the Privacy Policy.
agreement3: -To the cross-border transfer of my personal information to countries that I understand may not have the same data protection laws as my country of residence.

subscription_ios_title: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account.
subscription_description: Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
subscription_details: Users can manage their subscriptions on their devices by going to Settings > i_tunes & App Store.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this: Are you sure you want to delete this
error_retrieving_subscriptions: Error getting subscriptions from store, Make sure your network connection is valid and try again later
kids_mode_title: Enter your password for Kids Mode
kids_mode_description: Kids Mode viewing sets your account to showcase only child appropriate content. Some of our educational programs contain scenes or topics that may not be approved by all parents for all age groups. On Kids Mode, we will make sure that only child friendly programs populate your account across devices. To view all of our content, simply return here to disable Kids Mode.
